As a solo traveler, I was searching for a place that was accessible to the city and provided the comforts of home. Jeroen's apartment met all of these requirements. When I arrived, his parents met me and welcomed me to his lovely flat. Also, he left a map, and a pack of stroopwafel (an Amsterdam treat) and a handwritten card welcoming me to the city. The apartment was quite spacious and has a great floor plan. The bed was large and quite comfortable. There is storage in the bedroom for guests.

There is an enormous amount of natural light, and he has a patio where one can sit and sip tea in the morning. His apartment is located in a beautiful, hip and diverse neighborhood close to the city center.

Grocery and Stores: There are several stores, a bakery, coffee shops and restaurants within a 6-minute walk from his flat. Every day I would walk to Albert Heijn and purchase some freshly baked croissants and juice. The store offers an assortment of meals that you can cook at home. There's also a drugstore called Kruidavit close to the market. If you are looking for a gym, there is a gym on the other side of the flat which offers a free week trial membership.

Transportation: As you may know a majority of people in Amsterdam commute by bike. You can rent a bike, or catch the tram or bus. The bus is located one block over (a 2-minute walk), and the tram is three blocks away (6-minute walk). The #13 and #14 tram will take you to the Dam and other tourist areas and Central Station. You can also take a casual walk from the flat. It should take 40-45 minutes and is quite lovely and scenic.

Communication: While I did not have the pleasure to meet Jeroen, he was always available to answer questions via WhatsApp and AirBnB. He was always pleasant and patient with me. He would also occasionally send me a message to check on me.

Additional Info: The sun sets quite late in Amsterdam in the summer. On most nights, it wouldn't get dark until 11:00 pm. Bring an eye mask.

I had a great time at Jeroen's and would rebook whenever visiting the city. I highly recommend his flat for short term and long term stays. He is a great and genorous host.
